This is with latest 0.8.4 RC on Win7 x64, I have no idea yet what causes this, but I'm sure shutdown with previous versions was faster. This was with proxy enabled, problem seems to be non existant with proxy disabled. @sipa Any idea for such a behaviour? Any timeout blocking that thread?
